Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 95th/LaSalle
ShortDescription: WB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th: due to police activity near 95th/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 95th: due to police activity near 95th/LaSalle.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
